author: daxian-dbw
body:
## Steps to reproduce

"hello" -sp[tab]
5 -g[tab]
$true -an[tab]
## Expected behavior

Tab completion should work for all binary operators
## Actual behavior

All binary operators cannot be tab completed
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
CLRVersion
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
GitCommitId                    v0.6.0
```
## Regression Note

Tab completion for binary operators works fine in Nano PS and Full PS produced from SD.
title: Binary operators cannot be tab completed in CoreCLR and FullCLR OSPS
